problem_data.title: Maximum Sum of 3 Non-Overlapping Subarrays
problem_data.description:
Given an integer array nums and an integer k, find three non-overlapping subarrays of length k with maximum sum and return them.
Return the result as a list of indices representing the starting position of each interval (0-indexed). If there are multiple answers, return the lexicographically smallest one.

examples.explanation:
Subarrays [1, 2], [2, 6], [7, 5] correspond to the starting indices [0, 3, 5].
We could have also taken [2, 1], but an answer of [1, 3, 5] would be lexicographically larger.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([1, 2, 1, 2, 6, 7, 5, 1], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 3, 5]
  你的輸出: [0, 3, 5]

[測試#2] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([0, 0, 0, 0, 0], 1)
  標準輸出: [0, 1, 2]
  你的輸出: [0, 1, 2]

[測試#3] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([-1, -2, -3, -4, -5, -6], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 2, 4]
  你的輸出: [0, 2, 4]

[測試#4] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 2, 4]
  你的輸出: [0, 2, 4]

[測試#5] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([5, 1, 5], 1)
  標準輸出: [0, 1, 2]
  你的輸出: [0, 1, 2]

[測試#6] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([4, 3, 2, 1, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1], 3)
  標準輸出: [0, 3, 6]
  你的輸出: [0, 3, 6]

[測試#7] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 2, 4]
  你的輸出: [0, 2, 4]

[測試#8] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 2, 4]
  你的輸出: [0, 2, 4]

[測試#9] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: maxSumOfThreeSubarrays([0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0], 2)
  標準輸出: [0, 2, 5]
  你的輸出: [0, 2, 4]

=== 測試完成 (8/9) ===
[警告] 部分測資未通過 ❌（0.0001s）
